author: nflaig
content: anything besides https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/501 and https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/500 we want in the Electra release?

author: tersec
content: scanned all the deprecated methods and didn't find any others that weren't already removed that should be yet

author: nflaig
content: I am in favor of cutting a release today or tomorrow then, we can do a pre-release, sanity check it (eg. will run against lodestar) and then do the final release
